<template>
  <v-container fluid class="mt-5 myContainer">
    <v-card class="myCard">
      <v-row style="height:100%">
        <v-col class="containerMenuAside" sm="2">
          <menu-aside />
        </v-col>
        <v-col sm="9">
          <v-container>
            <v-row>
              <v-col>
                <InputSearchNote/>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          </v-container>
          <FormNewNote />
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
     
    </v-card>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import FormNewNote from "../components/Notes/FormNewNote.vue"
import InputSearchNote from "../components/Notes/InputSearchNote.vue"
import CardNote from "../components/Notes/CardNote.vue"
import MenuAside from "../components/MenuAside.vue";
export default {
  name: "Home",
  data: () => ({
      allNotes:[{
        idNote:1,
        title: "My first note",
        description: "You can now download an archive of all your data within the next 24 hours.",
        date: "13/09/2022"
      }],
    }),
  components: {
    MenuAside,
    FormNewNote,
    InputSearchNote,
    CardNote
  },
};
</script>

<style>
  .v-application--wrap{
    background: #aab8cb;
  }
  .myContainer, .myCard{
    height: 90vh !important;
  }
  .myCard{
    background-color: #edefff;
  }
  .containerMenuAside{
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-bottom: 0;
  }
</style>
